name: Leo's World
description: Embark on an exciting journey in this 2D platformer game, where you'll navigate through challenging obstacles, collect power-ups, and race to the treasure chest at the end of each level. With non-stop action and adventure, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you jump, run, and climb your way through obstacles and enemies. The game features stunning graphics and smooth controls, making it an enjoyable and immersive experience. With power-ups such as invincibility and super jump you'll have the tools to overcome even the toughest challenges. So what are you waiting for? Download the game and start your quest for treasure today! (AWSD to move, and SPACE to jump. Jump while touching a wall to WALL-JUMP)
